mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACS_LOG (LOG_ID, CRT_DT, CRTR, ACS_LOG) VALUES ('AL-'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')||'-'||LPAD(SEQ_ACS_LOG_PK.NEXTVAL,5,'0'), SYSDATE, #{crtr}, #{acsLog})
mapper.select:
SELECT AL.LOG_ID PK_COL , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY AL.CRT_DT || AL.LOG_ID DESC) RNUM , AL.LOG_ID , TO_CHAR(AL.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , AL.CRTR , AL.ACS_LOG , E.F_NM , E.L_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM ACS_LOG
WHERE CRTR = #{crtr} ) AL JOIN (SELECT E.* , E.L_NM || E.F_NM NM FROM EMP E) E ON E.EMP_ID = AL.CRTR
WHERE E.NM LIKE '%' || #{emp.fNm} || '%'
AND AL.CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDt} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND AL.CRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#{endDt} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT AL.ACS_LOG , AL.CRT_DT , E.EMP_ID , E.NM FROM (SELECT ACS_LOG , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , CRTR FROM ACS_LOG WHERE CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDt} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND CRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#{endDt} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AL JOIN (SELECT EMP_ID , L_NM || F_NM NM FROM EMP ) E ON E.EMP_ID = AL.CRTR
